posts.post_content:
A bunch of T206s for sale.  Dupes and such.  Most in VG or VGEX condition.  A couple have creases but most do not.  Ask for any specifics on any card interested in and I will describe in detail.

Selling individually for $35 each/shipped.  If buying multiples, consider them $32 per card with $3 shipping charge added on.  I'll throw in the insurance and tracking.

See them all at this link.

[url]http://s1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/Selling%20April%2012th/[/url]

The first card, the Ellam Southern Leaguer is $70 (creases and all). :)  The spot above the E in Piedmont is not on the card.  Just dirt on the scanner.
